entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
